data.name: The Metronomicon - The Soundtrack!
data.detailed_description:
The Soundtrack! Includes the following artists and tracks;

Original Tracks for

  • Jimmy Urine from Mindless Self Indulgence - Fighting with the Melody
  • Shiny Toy Guns - Live it Up
  • Efe Tozan - Beyoglu Nights
  • Efe Tozan - 111
  • Viking Guitar - Dropship
------------------------------------------------
  • Dj CUTMAN and Popcorn Kid - Samurai
  • Mega Ran - Miss Communication
  • Machinae Supremacy - Republic of Gamers
  • Ben Briggs - Methods
  • Viking Guitar - The Players' Score
  • J-Punch - Hollow Bodies
  • J-Punch and Shelley Harland - The Secret (Openair Mix)
  • J-Punch - Nilobytes
  • J-Punch - Temple
  • J-Punch - Almost Over
  • Jamie Brennan - Back Home
  • Zenbi - Down
  • JERC & Rondevu - Do It Right
  • Solila - Blazing (Original Mix)
  • Phunktastike - Citrik (XS Night Remix)
  • Hugh Holton - Keep Moving
  • Phonetic Hero - Pubstep
  • Demoscene Time Machine - Buccaneer
  • DJ Sultan - Strike Me
  • Rosie - Midnight
  • Rosie - For the Love of God
  • Evan Gamble - The Last Stop for Us
  • Dreamachine - Escape Boss
  • Dreamachine - Swamp Dive
  • Crushcraze - Bed Down with a Monster
  • Crushcraze - Strut Peacock
  • Kubbi - Cascade
  • Stemage - Fat Man in the Pool
  • Knight Heir - SAY MY NAME
  • Maini Sorri - Lost Love
  • Christopher Hoag - Israel
  • Christopher Hoag - Clocks and Highways
  • Christopher Hoag - Mr. Mayhem

data.short_description: You got your glowsticks in my chainmail! You got your fireballs in my dubstep! but with SOUND!

fullgame.name: The Metronomicon: Slay The Dance Floor

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Sound Card: One that allows sound to come out of a sound maker

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Sound Card: One that allows sound to come out of a sound maker
